entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Periods of wet snow over higher terrain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h except south 40 near the water late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
